bspam 1.2.2
  • Reference

Function reference

All functions

MCEM
Passage calibration data set
fit.model()
This is an interface function to call and run mcem.
get.cases()
Returns cases (person and occasion) applied in [fit.model] function.
passage2
Passage-level student data set
plot(<mcem>)
Plot function to show graph of mcem class
prep()
This file includes utilities of bspam package.
preplong()
Prepares data in a long format for [wcpm]
prepwide()
Prepares data in a wide format for [mcem].
scoring()
This is an interface function to call and run scoring or bootstrap.
summary(<bootstrap>)
summary the information of bootstrap class
summary(<fit.model>)
summary the information of fit.model class
summary(<scoring>)
summary the information of wcpm class
